mapper.select: SELECT s.SupID AS supID, s.SupName AS supName, s.SupBrand AS supBrand FROM users_supplement us JOIN supplement s ON us.SupID = s.SupID WHERE us.UserID = #{userId}
SELECT SupID AS supID, SupName AS supName, SupBrand AS supBrand FROM supplement WHERE SupName LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND SupBrand = #{brand}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM users_supplement WHERE UserID = #{userId} AND SupID = #{supId}
